text: "Part-Time Love" is a 1978 song by Elton John and is the sixth track from his 12th studio album A Single Man. It went to number 22 in the United States, number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in Australia, number 13 in Canada, number 11 in Ireland, number 14 in New Zealand and number 6 in South Africa. It was banned in Russia due to it being rauchy. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Disco songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Part-Time Love
